front.title: Propagation of ARP/ND Flags in EVPN

abstract.t: This document defines an Extended Community that is advertised along with an EVPN MAC/IP Advertisement route and carries information relevant to the ARP/ND resolution, so that an EVPN PE implementing a proxy-ARP/ND or ARP/ND (on IRB interfaces) function can reply to ARP Requests or Neighbor Solicitations with the correct information.
